archimate:Device.name: Multi-Touch Display Panel (MTDP)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Departments: Executive boardroom, administrative meeting rooms, clinical planning rooms, telemedicine consultation areas. • Purpose: Facilitate interactive presentations, data visualization, video conferencing, collaborative planning, and annotation in medium to large hospital meeting spaces.
1. Display Specifications
• Screen Size: 75–86" • Resolution: o 4K UHD (3840 x 2160) for high-detail viewing of medical images, dashboards, and documents • Brightness: o Minimum 400–500 nits, suitable for rooms with ambient lighting • Contrast Ratio: o 1200:1 or higher for clear display of fine detail and visual content • Viewing Angle: o 178° horizontal and vertical for visibility across the room • Glass Surface: o Tempered, anti-glare, anti-fingerprint, and antimicrobial coating for hygiene compliance in healthcare environments
2. Touch Input Specifications
• Touch Technology: o Infrared (IR) or Projected Capacitive (PCAP) for precise, smooth input o Palm rejection support • Touch Points: o 20-point multi-touch minimum, allowing simultaneous interaction by multiple users • Input Methods: o Finger touch o Passive stylus o Gloves-compatible (for clinical environments)
3. Connectivity Options
• Wired Ports: o 3x HDMI (input), 1x HDMI out o 2x USB-C, 4x USB-A (touch + storage/media) o DisplayPort () o 1x LAN (RJ-45, Gigabit) o 1x RS-232 (control systems) o 3.5 mm audio in/out o SPDIF or optical out (for high-quality audio systems) • Wireless Connectivity: o Wi-Fi 6 (ensure compliance with access points) (802.11ax) o Bluetooth 5.0+ o Built-in wireless screen mirroring (Miracast, AirPlay, Google Cast support)
4. Audio System
• Integrated Speakers: o Minimum 2x 15W speakers for built-in audio playback o Compatible with external AV systems or soundbars • Microphone Support: o integration with external microphone arrays or ceiling mics for video conferencing
5. System & Software
• Operating System: o Windows 11 Pro for hospital applications o Supports dual-OS operation for flexibility • Software Features: o Digital whiteboard app with drawing/annotation tools o Split-screen display for multitasking (e.g., presentation + notes) o File sharing (via USB or cloud storage integration) o Remote management software support (IT control panel)
6. Power and Energy Efficiency
• Power Supply: o 220–240V AC, 50 Hz (standard hospital electrical configuration) • Energy Efficiency: o Auto power-off/sleep mode o Power consumption under 300W (active), <1W (standby)
7. Mounting Options
• Wall Mounting: o VESA standard mount support (600x400mm or 800x400mm) • Mobile Stand (): o Rolling stand with lockable wheels o Height-adjustable for varied room setups
8. Durability and Maintenance
• Housing: o Durable aluminum or steel chassis o Medical-grade finishes for regular cleaning with disinfectants
